Articles.Content: Hello, I bulit a Mercury capsule+launcher (Mercury-Redstone, 1500-ish Delta-v) and... it worked.. well kind of. I replaced the retropack with a tiny RCS tank and three RCS ports at the bottom. The LES is not so realistic, but who cares? The launcher was 2 FL-800 tanks with an LV-45 on the bottom. It launched me to 150000 meters (After retro rocket burn; without, it takes you to 200000m) Then, I popped the chutes.. and then it exploded. 3 hours of work gone down the drain. Capsule is really realstic, almost better than Mulbin's. Any thoughts?
